line_provenance.description: Revenue from selling advertising placements on our family of apps to marketers, which is reflected in FoA. Ads on our platform enable marketers to reach people across a range of marketing objectives, such as generating leads or driving awareness.
line_provenance.evidence_snippet: Revenue from selling advertising placements on our family of apps to marketers, which is reflected in FoA. Ads on our platform enable marketers to reach people across a range of marketing objectives, such as generating leads or driving awareness.

line_provenance.description: revenue from WhatsApp Business Platform, Meta Verified subscriptions, net fees we receive from developers using our Payments infrastructure, and revenue from various other sources.
line_provenance.evidence_snippet: revenue from WhatsApp Business Platform, Meta Verified subscriptions, net fees we receive from developers using our Payments infrastructure, and revenue from various other sources.

line_provenance.description: the delivery of consumer hardware products, such as Meta Quest and Ray-Ban Meta AI glasses, and related software and content.
line_provenance.evidence_snippet: the delivery of consumer hardware products, such as Meta Quest and Ray-Ban Meta AI glasses, and related software and content.
